content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > show off your crochet projects and > connect with other makers in the sweet > bee crochet facebook community > clikc here to join 1 the keep cozy chunky scarf is a quick project to crochet perfect for cold winter days or when you need a fast project for a last minute gift using bernat softee chunky yarn and a 10mm crochet hook you ll create a beautiful and simple texture by creating alternating blocks of stitch repetitions a special stitch tutorial linked to a detailed walk-through can be found within the pattern **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - special stitch tutorials with direct links for detailed walk throughs - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approx 218-219 yards of weight 6 super bulky acrylic yarn i used bernat softee chunky - 10mm crochet hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape **this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
